meanings.sent1: The inexpediencies of wearing sandals in the snow were evident.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the inexpediencies of starting the project without proper planning.
meanings.sent3: The inexpediencies of trying to fit a square peg into a round hole became a humorous office joke.
meanings.sent4: Her clumsiness on the dance floor highlighted the inexpediencies of her choice in shoes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation of gravity made the concept of inexpediencies crystal clear to the students.

meanings.sent1: The trip was delayed due to unexpected inexpediencies in the travel plans.
meanings.sent2: She carefully considered the inexpediencies of moving to a new city without a job lined up.
meanings.sent3: The inexpediencies of forgetting her umbrella on a rainy day left her drenched but laughing.
meanings.sent4: The inexpediencies of a leaky roof became apparent during the heavy storm.
meanings.sent5: The inefficiency of the old system was highlighted by the inexpediencies it caused in daily operations.
